changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE application.users_team( user_id bigint NOT NULL, team_id bigint NOT NULL, role_id bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT ut_pk PRIMARY KEY (user_id, team_id), CONSTRAINT ut_team_fk FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES application.team (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT ut_users_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT ut_team_role_fk FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES application.roles_team (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
